attributes.action: discontinue the practice of 'testing on animals', and implement those same tests on convicted murderers and paedophiles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would enable those convicted to give something back to humanity by freely offering their services to clinical (and any other) testing.

It would prevent many animals from suffering.

It might also act as a deterrent.

The conviction would, of course, have to be 100% secure before any form of testing can take place.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
